Package com.bencodez.simpleapi.servercomm.mysql

Class MySqlMessenger

java.lang.Object
com.bencodez.simpleapi.servercomm.mysql.MySqlMessenger
public class MySqlMessenger extends Object
Single MySQL-backed message queue messenger. Option A implementation: - NO long-lived pooled Connections. - Each loop borrows a Connection, tries GET_LOCK with a small timeout, processes a batch, RELEASE_LOCK, then closes Connection. Table schema: {tableName}_message_queue

  • Constructor Details

    • MySqlMessenger

      public MySqlMessenger(String tableName, DataSource dataSource, MySqlMessenger.Mode mode, String serverId, Consumer<MySqlMessenger.QueueMessage> onMessage) throws SQLException
      Parameters:
      tableName - base name, table will be {tableName}_message_queue
      dataSource - datasource
      mode - BACKEND or PROXY
      serverId - required when mode == BACKEND, ignored for PROXY
      onMessage - callback for each message received
      Throws:
      SQLException
